Package net.royalur.rules.simple

Class SimpleGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.Game<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​Roll>
      • net.royalur.rules.simple.SimpleGame
  • public class SimpleGame
extends Game<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​Roll>
    A game of the Royal Game of Ur that uses a simple rule set. This class exists to reduce the need to use as many generics.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class net.royalur.Game

      Instantiates a simple game of the Royal Game of Ur.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleGame

        public SimpleGame​(@Nonnull
                  SimpleRuleSet<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​Roll> rules,
                  @Nonnull
                  PlayerIdentity lightIdentity,
                  @Nonnull
                  PlayerIdentity darkIdentity,
                  @Nonnull
                  java.util.List<GameState<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​Roll>> gameStates)
        Instantiates a simple game of the Royal Game of Ur.
        Parameters:
        rules - The set of rules that are being used for this game.
        lightIdentity - The identity of the light player.
        darkIdentity - The identity of the dark player.
        gameStates - The states that have occurred so far in the game.
